name: German Shepherd
food_recommendation: German Shepherds require a high-protein, nutrient-rich diet with joint supplements for their active lifestyle, especially in warm climates.

name: Labrador Retriever
food_recommendation: Labradors thrive on a balanced diet with controlled portions to avoid obesity, particularly in warm climates.

name: Golden Retriever
food_recommendation: Golden Retrievers require a diet rich in protein and omega-3 fatty acids to support their skin, coat, and joint health.

name: Rottweiler
food_recommendation: Rottweilers need a high-protein, calcium-rich diet to maintain their muscle and bone strength, especially in hot climates.

name: Bulldog
food_recommendation: Bulldogs require a low-fat, high-fiber diet to prevent obesity and skin issues, with extra care during hot weather.

name: Pug
food_recommendation: Pugs need a balanced diet with small portions to avoid weight gain, and ensure hydration during warmer months.

name: Dalmatian
food_recommendation: Dalmatians thrive on high-quality protein and low-purine diets to maintain their energy levels and avoid urinary issues.

name: Doberman Pinscher
food_recommendation: Dobermans need a protein-rich, nutrient-dense diet for their lean muscles and active lifestyle, especially in warm climates.

name: Shih Tzu
food_recommendation: Shih Tzus benefit from a diet rich in protein and omega-3 fatty acids for their coat and small size, especially in hot weather.

name: Pakistani Bully
food_recommendation: The Pakistani Bully requires a diet with high protein and moderate fat to maintain muscle strength, with proper hydration during hot climates.

name: Siberian Husky
food_recommendation: Huskies need a high-protein, low-fat diet with plenty of hydration, especially in Pakistan's warm climate to help them cope with the heat.
